title: quota calculation problem. files direct deleted, no trash
body:
### expected behaviour
working trash bin

### actual behaviour
if i delete a file, its directly gone. trash bin is empty, also the folder on the server.

as the log shows, owncloud thinks my quota is over 50% used. i use 2,9gb of 20gb!

if i uploaded 2.8 gb of files to another account with 5 gb quota, the files in trash are still there. i uploaded 5 gb and restored files from trash:

![2013-06-28 12_30_51-owncloud demonstrant](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/91113/721339/d78e7564-dfdd-11e2-8fb2-7f2d0b7dd65a.png)

found this problem after update to .7
(works normal on a fresh installed oc 5.0.7 on another server)

### steps to reproduce
1. have oc 5.0.6 (updated from 5.0.5)
2. update to 5.0.7
3. test some days, with client sync etc
4. delete files
5. don't find them in trash bin

### server configuration
ubuntu 12.04.2 lts
apache 2.2.22 (ubuntu)
mysql ver 14.14 distrib 5.5.31
php 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.6
owncloud 5.0.7 (installed 5.0.5)

normal local storage used
ssl configured and working
cron every 5 min.
upload max 2 gb

### client configuration
browser: chrome 27
operating system:  windows 7 pro
client 1.3.0
